compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/jagan-kumar-patra/nodeJs/aws-serve.serviceRawFile:
org: jagan2002
app: awsapp2002
service: hello-lambda-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:PutItem
          Resource: "*"
  environment:
    USER_POOL_ID: us-east-1_x2jZAgWic
    USER_CLIENT_ID: 3t1cipggjjbcapot79o3duomsm
    MONGO_URI: "mongodb+srv://jaganpatra_db_user:Patra123@cluster0.twvcjqe.mongodb.net/?appName=Cluster0"
  httpApi:
    authorizers:
      CognitoAuthorizer:
        type: jwt
        identitySource: "$request.header.Authorization"
        issuerUrl: https://cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/us-east-1_x2jZAgWic
        audience:
          - 3t1cipggjjbcapot79o3duomsm

resources:
  Resources:
    CustomerTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: primary_key
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: primary_key
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        TableName: customer_table

functions:
  getCustomer:
    handler: hello-lambda-api/getCustomer.getCustomer
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /
          method: get
          authorizer:
            name: CognitoAuthorizer

  createCustomer:
    handler: hello-lambda-api/createCustomer.createCustomer
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /customer
          method: post
          authorizer:
            name: CognitoAuthorizer
  
  signup:
    handler: hello-lambda-api/auth/signup.signup
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /signup
          method: post
  
  login:
    handler: hello-lambda-api/auth/login.login
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /login
          method: post
